body:
Here is the error message I get when trying to create a parallel-netcdf package:

``` bash
$ spack create http://cucis.ece.northwestern.edu/projects/PnetCDF/Release/parallel-netcdf-1.6.1.tar.gz
==> This looks like a URL for parallel-netcdf version 1.6.1.
==> Creating template for package parallel-netcdf
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/soft/spack/bin/spack", line 176, in <module>
    main()
  File "/soft/spack/bin/spack", line 154, in main
    return_val = command(parser, args)
  File "/blues/gpfs/home/software/spack/lib/spack/spack/cmd/create.py", line 259, in create
    versions, urls = fetch_tarballs(url, name, args)
  File "/blues/gpfs/home/software/spack/lib/spack/spack/cmd/create.py", line 225, in fetch_tarballs
    versions = { version : url }
NameError: global name 'version' is not defined
```
title: Spack create crashes due to undefined variable
